casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tilmon Charles GOLPHIN 441A98-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 7, 2018 Jay H. Ferguson, Kenneth J. Rose, Attorneys at Law, Durham, for Golphin, Tilmon Charles. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C. James E. Williams, Jr., Attorney at Law, Carrboro, Burton Craige, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Robert P. Mosteller, Attorney at Law, for Professors John Charles Boger & Robert P. Mosteller. Grady Jessup, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Association of Black Lawyers. Lisa A. Bakale-Wise, Attorney at Law, Irving Joyner, Attorney at Law, Durham, for N.C. State Conference of the NAACP. Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Social Scientists. Janet Moore, Attorney at Law, for National Association for Public Defense. Carlos E. Mahoney, Attorney at Law, Durham, Jin Hee Lee, W. Kerrel Murray, Attorneys at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Fund, Inc. Cynthia F. Adcock, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Council of Churches. Jeremy M. Falcone, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Paul F. Khoury, Robert L. Walker, Madeline J. Cohen, Attorneys at Law, Pro Hac Vice, Washington, DC, for Former State and Federal Prosecutors.

*738The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 6th of November 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of November 2018."
